definition: suffix of a noun of locality
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: Plus immigration queues in many airports are very long and very slow-moving.
sentences.chinese: 而且很多機場的邊檢隊伍還長如龍，慢如蟲。

sentences.english: But more and more people gathered in front of the border crossings, demanding entry to the West.
sentences.chinese: 但越來越多的人聚集在邊檢站前，要求進入西德。

sentences.english: Free Trade Zone, Frontier Inspection, commodity inspection, Payment Settling Bank, Shipping Market.
sentences.chinese: 保稅區，邊檢，商檢，結匯銀行，船務市場。

sentences.english: East and West Berliners pass through a border checkpoint the day after the Wall fell.
sentences.chinese: 在牆倒第二天，西柏林和東柏林人穿過一個邊檢站。

sentences.english: The natives do not have to deal with enhanced border control procedures.
sentences.chinese: 當地人不需要搞定現金的邊檢程序。

definition: Lok Ma Chau (place in Hong Kong)
area in the Shangcheng district of Hangzhou
open sluice gate/(toll) station/boarding gate (airport etc)/(fig.) gateway (access point)
to suppress smugglers/to search for smuggled goods
Sha Tau Kok (town in Hong Kong)
to intercept/to cut off and capture
to access/to transfer passengers between two railway lines
